title: Companion Approval Guide
content: Karlach + ?? Roah Moonglow Goblin Camp ,Shattered Sanctum - Trader in he Lower Left/South- West Side of Area. If you saved Sazza from the prison, tell Minthara "She is too stupid to understand" Save the Goblin Sazza Requirement/s: ?? Lae'zel +Shadowheart +Astarion +Wyll + Karlach - Sazza Minthara Goblin Camp ,Shattered Sanctum - North Eastern part of the Sanctum, Minthara's Room. Tell the Goblin Children throwing rocks at the bear to use sharper rocks. Rescue the Druid Halsin Requirement/s: ?? A
